originalText.text:
I had been seeing my neurologist, Dr. Madeline Fields, for many years now. She and her assistants have been there for me in person, on the phone and responds to my messages. Due to my sickness, I appreciate her so much for helping me find the quality of life I am looking for. I recommend others of seeing her.  She is trustworthy, caring, and gives valuable informations.
She and her assistants are one of the best!
Marsha Davidson
